Name: Fifty.ServerMessages [FSM]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements server side messages and player score tracking

Dependencies:
  - Northstar
  - Fifty.ServerUtilities
  - Fifty.ServerChatCommands

ConVars.Name: FSM_WELCOME_USE_RUI
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to use a large message on the HUD or chat messages.

ConVars.Name: FSM_WELCOME_MESSAGE_TITLE
ConVars.HelpString: When using the rui message this is the title, otherwise this is the first message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_WELCOME_MESSAGE_TEXT
ConVars.HelpString: When using the rui message this is the description, otherwise this is the second message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_WELCOME_MESSAGE_IMAGE
ConVars.HelpString: The image used by the rui message. ( https://discord.com/channels/920776187884732556/1001559004889223258 )

ConVars.Name: FSM_MARVIN_DEATH_NOTIFICATION
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to shame players who kill marvins in chat.

ConVars.Name: FSM_PLAYER_FALL_DEATH_NOTIFICATION
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to shame players who fell into the pits on glitch and wargames or fell off the cliff on relic.

ConVars.Name: FSM_PLAYER_KILLSTREAK
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to announce player killstreaks.

ConVars.Name: FSM_USE_RUI_POPUP_FOR_KILLSTREAK
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to use a popup message or chat for killstream messages.

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_ENABLE
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to broadcast messages each 150 seconds.

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_RANDOM
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to randomise the broadcast message order.

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_0
ConVars.DefaultValue: You can use the %H%Pnextmap <map>%N command to vote for the next map!
ConVars.HelpString: The first broadcast message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_1
ConVars.DefaultValue: You can use the %H%Pskip%N command to vote to skip the map!
ConVars.HelpString: The second broadcast message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_2
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Pextend%N to vote to extend the match.
ConVars.HelpString: The third broadcast message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_3
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Phelp <command>%N to get a detailed description of what it does.
ConVars.HelpString: The fourth broadcast message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_4
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Pmaps%N to get a list of maps in the voting pool.
ConVars.HelpString: The fifth broadcast message. Can use formatting ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_PRINT_ON_MATCH_START
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to print the INFO page at the starting of a match, the contents of which are defined by the next five ConVars, and can be whatever you like

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_0
ConVars.HelpString: First info value. Won't be printed if left empty, leaving this one empty also disables the !info command. ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_1
ConVars.HelpString: Second info value. Won't be printed if left empty. ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_2
ConVars.DefaultValue:
%FBasic commands:
   %H%Phelp %T- see all commands
   %H%Pkick %T- vote to kick someone
   %H%Pswitch %T- change team
   %H%Pskip %T- vote to skip map
ConVars.HelpString: Third info value. Won't be printed if left empty. ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_3
ConVars.HelpString: Fourth info value. Won't be printed if left empty. ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )

ConVars.Name: FSM_INFO_4
ConVars.DefaultValue: %TYou can us %H%Pinfo%T to see this message again.
ConVars.HelpString: Fifth info value. Won't be printed if left empty. ( '%P' - command prefix, '%H' - highlight, '%T' - normal text, '%N' - Server announce color, '%0' - reset formatting )
